title: 7 Mexican Flan Recipes to Make With Few Ingredients
description: From simple flan made with few ingredients to layered flan cakes, you'll come back to these irresistible recipes again and again

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 7 Absolutely Irresistible Mexican Flan Recipes By Corey Williams Corey Williams Corey Williams is a food writer for MyRecipes and Allrecipes. She has a decade of journalism experience. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on April 10, 2025 Close Credits: Kim's Cooking Now If you're looking for a rich, creamy, and decadent dessert you can make with pantry staples, your search ends with this collection of our best Mexican flan recipes. From simple flan made with few ingredients to layered flan cakes, you'll come back to these irresistible recipes again and again. 01 of 08 Flan Mexicano (Mexican Flan) ShellsBells "This recipe was given to me by my mother-in-law, who is from Durango, Mexico," says recipe creator Amy Shurts. "I had to beg her for years to give this recipe to me. Finally, she gave it to me for Christmas." View Recipe Save 02 of 08 Original Mexican Flan Napolitano gem This six-ingredient flan made with pantry staples (sweetened condensed milk, sugar, evaporated milk, eggs, cream cheese, and vanilla extract) is steamed instead of baked. View Recipe Save 03 of 08 Impossible Flan Cake gem "This recipe was so simple. I made my own caramel sauce and made it in a very decorative bundt pan," says reviewer JR. "It came out easily and beautifully. I've even made it in a hurry using a cake mix and it was wonderful. The cake was moist but dense. A keeper!" View Recipe Save 04 of 08 Flan sanzoe Make this decadent dessert with just three easy-to-find ingredients: sugar, eggs, and milk. Recipe submitter Bobby Kleinveld calls it "the best dessert ever invented." View Recipe Save 05 of 08 Coconut Cheese Flan (Flan de Coco y Queso) mauigirl "PERFECT! I loved it," writes reviewer LatinaCook. "I always make the caramel in the microwave (not the ideal way, but it works). 1 cup sugar + 1/2 cup water in a Pyrex. 15 minutes later (microwaves are all different though) I've got the perfect colored amber caramel. I bought just one 8oz block of cream cheese because I didn't pay attention, so I used that and it was still great. I loved the flavor, the texture, the consistency, the ease to make...everything." View Recipe Save 06 of 08 Flan de Queso (Cream Cheese Flan) Milla D "This is my favorite recipe, learned from my mother," says recipe creator damaris. "People love it and ask me for the recipe every time they try it, so here it is." Luscious Cream Cheese Desserts View Recipe Save 07 of 08 Baked Flan Vanessa Barrios Contreras "This is an awesome recipe for flan," raves reviewer Barbara V. "It was easy to make and well worth it! It came out better than any store bought flan I've ever bought!!!" View Recipe Save 08 of 08 More Inspiration Chef John Pictured: Chef John's Cheesecake Flan Hungry for more? Check out our collections of Flan Recipes and Mexican Desserts next. What is Flan? Pina Colada Flan Super Easy Cream Cheese Flan Explore more: Recipes Desserts Custards and Puddings Flan Recipes Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
